spec.title: Cascading Style Sheets Level 2 Revision 1 (CSS 2.1) Specification

properties.name: margin-top
properties.appliesTo: all elements except elements with table display types other than table-caption, table and inline-table
properties.percentages: refer to width of containing block
properties.computed value: the percentage as specified or the absolute length

properties.name: margin-bottom
properties.appliesTo: all elements except elements with table display types other than table-caption, table and inline-table
properties.percentages: refer to width of containing block
properties.computed value: the percentage as specified or the absolute length

properties.name: margin-right
properties.appliesTo: all elements except elements with table display types other than table-caption, table and inline-table
properties.percentages: refer to width of containing block
properties.computed value: the percentage as specified or the absolute length

properties.name: margin-left
properties.appliesTo: all elements except elements with table display types other than table-caption, table and inline-table
properties.percentages: refer to width of containing block
properties.computed value: the percentage as specified or the absolute length

properties.name: margin
properties.appliesTo: all elements except elements with table display types other than table-caption, table and inline-table
properties.percentages: refer to width of containing block

properties.name: padding-top
properties.appliesTo: all elements except table-row-group, table-header-group, table-footer-group, table-row, table-column-group and table-column
properties.percentages: refer to width of containing block
properties.computed value: the percentage as specified or the absolute length

properties.name: padding-right
properties.appliesTo: all elements except table-row-group, table-header-group, table-footer-group, table-row, table-column-group and table-column
properties.percentages: refer to width of containing block
properties.computed value: the percentage as specified or the absolute length

properties.name: padding-bottom
properties.appliesTo: all elements except table-row-group, table-header-group, table-footer-group, table-row, table-column-group and table-column
properties.percentages: refer to width of containing block
properties.computed value: the percentage as specified or the absolute length

properties.name: padding-left
properties.appliesTo: all elements except table-row-group, table-header-group, table-footer-group, table-row, table-column-group and table-column
properties.percentages: refer to width of containing block
properties.computed value: the percentage as specified or the absolute length

properties.name: padding
properties.appliesTo: all elements except table-row-group, table-header-group, table-footer-group, table-row, table-column-group and table-column
properties.percentages: refer to width of containing block

properties.name: border-top-width
properties.computed value: absolute length; '0' if the border style is 'none' or 'hidden'

properties.name: border-right-width
properties.computed value: absolute length; '0' if the border style is 'none' or 'hidden'

properties.name: border-bottom-width
properties.computed value: absolute length; '0' if the border style is 'none' or 'hidden'

properties.name: border-left-width
properties.computed value: absolute length; '0' if the border style is 'none' or 'hidden'

properties.name: border-top-color
properties.computed value: when taken from the 'color' property, the computed value of 'color'; otherwise, as specified

properties.name: border-right-color
properties.computed value: when taken from the 'color' property, the computed value of 'color'; otherwise, as specified

properties.name: border-bottom-color
properties.computed value: when taken from the 'color' property, the computed value of 'color'; otherwise, as specified

properties.name: border-left-color
properties.computed value: when taken from the 'color' property, the computed value of 'color'; otherwise, as specified

properties.name: display
properties.value: inline | block | list-item | inline-block | table | inline-table | table-row-group | table-header-group | table-footer-group | table-row | table-column-group | table-column | table-cell | table-caption | none | inherit

properties.name: top
properties.percentages: refer to height of containing block
properties.computed value: if specified as a length, the corresponding absolute length; if specified as a percentage, the specified value; otherwise, 'auto'.

properties.name: right
properties.percentages: refer to width of containing block
properties.computed value: if specified as a length, the corresponding absolute length; if specified as a percentage, the specified value; otherwise, 'auto'.

properties.name: bottom
properties.percentages: refer to height of containing block
properties.computed value: if specified as a length, the corresponding absolute length; if specified as a percentage, the specified value; otherwise, 'auto'.

properties.name: left
properties.percentages: refer to width of containing block
properties.computed value: if specified as a length, the corresponding absolute length; if specified as a percentage, the specified value; otherwise, 'auto'.

properties.name: width
properties.appliesTo: all elements but non-replaced inline elements, table rows, and row groups
properties.percentages: refer to width of containing block
properties.computed value: the percentage or 'auto' as specified or the absolute length

properties.name: min-width
properties.appliesTo: all elements but non-replaced inline elements, table rows, and row groups
properties.percentages: refer to width of containing block
properties.computed value: the percentage as specified or the absolute length

properties.name: max-width
properties.appliesTo: all elements but non-replaced inline elements, table rows, and row groups
properties.percentages: refer to width of containing block
properties.computed value: the percentage as specified or the absolute length or 'none'

properties.name: height
properties.appliesTo: all elements but non-replaced inline elements, table columns, and column groups
properties.computed value: the percentage or 'auto' (see prose under <percentage>) or the absolute length

properties.name: min-height
properties.appliesTo: all elements but non-replaced inline elements, table columns, and column groups
properties.computed value: the percentage as specified or the absolute length

properties.name: max-height
properties.appliesTo: all elements but non-replaced inline elements, table columns, and column groups
properties.computed value: the percentage as specified or the absolute length or 'none'

properties.name: line-height
properties.percentages: refer to the font size of the element itself
properties.computed value: for <length> and <percentage> the absolute value; otherwise as specified

properties.name: vertical-align
properties.value: baseline | sub | super | top | text-top | middle | bottom | text-bottom | <percentage> | <length> | inherit
properties.percentages: refer to the 'line-height' of the element itself
properties.computed value: for <percentage> and <length> the absolute length, otherwise as specified

properties.name: clip
properties.computed value: 'auto' if specified as 'auto', otherwise a rectangle with four values, each of which is 'auto' if specified as 'auto' and the computed length otherwise

properties.name: content
properties.value: normal | none | [ <string> | <uri> | <counter> | attr(<identifier>) | open-quote | close-quote | no-open-quote | no-close-quote ]+ | inherit
properties.computed value: On elements, always computes to 'normal'. On :before and :after, if 'normal' is specified, computes to 'none'. Otherwise, for URI values, the absolute URI; for attr() values, the resulting string; for other keywords, as specified.

properties.name: list-style-type
properties.value: disc | circle | square | decimal | decimal-leading-zero | lower-roman | upper-roman | lower-greek | lower-latin | upper-latin | armenian | georgian | lower-alpha | upper-alpha | none | inherit

properties.name: page-break-before
properties.value: auto | always | avoid | left | right | inherit

properties.name: page-break-after
properties.value: auto | always | avoid | left | right | inherit

properties.name: background-position
properties.value: [ [ <percentage> | <length> | left | center | right ] [ <percentage> | <length> | top | center | bottom ]? ] | [ [ left | center | right ] || [ top | center | bottom ] ] | inherit
properties.percentages: refer to the size of the box itself
properties.computed value: for <length> the absolute value, otherwise a percentage

properties.name: font
properties.value: [ [ <'font-style'> || <'font-variant'> || <'font-weight'> ]? <'font-size'> [ / <'line-height'> ]? <'font-family'> ] | caption | icon | menu | message-box | small-caption | status-bar | inherit

properties.name: text-indent
properties.percentages: refer to width of containing block
properties.computed value: the percentage as specified or the absolute length

properties.name: text-align
properties.initial: a nameless value that acts as 'left' if 'direction' is 'ltr', 'right' if 'direction' is 'rtl'
properties.computed value: the initial value or as specified

properties.name: text-decoration
properties.value: none | [ underline || overline || line-through || blink ] | inherit

properties.name: word-spacing
properties.computed value: for 'normal' the value '0'; otherwise the absolute length

properties.name: white-space
properties.value: normal | pre | nowrap | pre-wrap | pre-line | inherit

properties.name: cursor
properties.value: [ [<uri> ,]* [ auto | crosshair | default | pointer | move | e-resize | ne-resize | nw-resize | n-resize | se-resize | sw-resize | s-resize | w-resize | text | wait | help | progress ] ] | inherit
properties.computed value: as specified, except with any relative URLs converted to absolute

properties.name: outline-width
properties.computed value: absolute length; '0' if the outline style is 'none'

properties.name: volume
properties.value: <number> | <percentage> | silent | x-soft | soft | medium | loud | x-loud | inherit

properties.name: azimuth
properties.value: <angle> | [[ left-side | far-left | left | center-left | center | center-right | right | far-right | right-side ] || behind ] | leftwards | rightwards | inherit

properties.name: elevation
properties.value: <angle> | below | level | above | higher | lower | inherit

properties.name: speech-rate
properties.value: <number> | x-slow | slow | medium | fast | x-fast | faster | slower | inherit

properties.name: pitch
properties.value: <frequency> | x-low | low | medium | high | x-high | inherit

properties.name: speak-header
properties.appliesTo: elements that have table header information
